attributes.action: Call a general election as the Tory government in fighting has gone on too long
attributes.additional_details: The Tory in fighting for next PM does not address the current crisis with energy prices and cost of living that is going on. This is still going on while the general public are really struggling. I say hold a general election to decide a new government rather than only members of the Conservative party that can chose their next leader, as this does not show the views of the public.
attributes.background: Hold a general election that reflects the views of the actual public not party members. The Tory in fighting is still currently going on, while the public are struggling with the cost of living and energy crisis.
